title: For what it's worth riot, I appreciate you as a company
body:
Riot gets a lot of hate sometimes, but I would just like to say that I love your game and your actions.

Sure, sometimes you screw up, or get greedy or downright break the game, but I still beleive that you are trying to advance this game the best you can, and are often succeeding.

You didn't make me pay a cent to enjoy what is one of my favorite games, which you still at least try to improve rather than just let it be, and that alone is enough to earn my respect, for what it's worth.

replies.body: Thanks for the kind words. Players like you are what make this game great, not because you praise us but because you're passionate about the game. If you didn't care, didn't have passion, and didn't hold us accountable when we stumble, it just wouldn't be worth investing as much as we do into making League as good as it can possibly be.
You're welcome, I'm glad that i could help, even in this small way.

I will second this!
Since the MYMU {{champion:143}} was creeping her way into my pool and has been the first character to claim my main spot(4ish year player btw).
And yes they are people the make mistakes, but thats nit when you abandon someone, that is when you rally behind them, imho.
You sir need to wake up out of your Riot dream
You sir, should realize people still enjoy this game, and there is always more then one truth.
And here we have a fine example of the delusional morons that enable greedy assholes like Beck / Merril / Ma, and whoever runs Activision / EA / Ubisoft / all them.
